heading: HR02270
0: RESOLUTION EXPRESSING SUPPORT OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES FOR THE WITHDRAWAL OF THE MEMBERSHIP OF THE PHILIPPINES FROM THE INTER-PARLIAMENTARY UNION
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02270
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION EXPRESSING SUPPORT OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES FOR THE WITHDRAWAL OF THE MEMBERSHIP OF THE PHILIPPINES FROM THE INTER-PARLIAMENTARY UNION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUAREZ, DANILO E.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-23
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2018-11-20
          -Requested for a position paper from the Department of Foreign Affairs
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-12-04
          -The Committee deliberated on and subsequently adopted in toto HR 2270
          -The Committee adopted HR 2270
      3. Draft of Committee Report and Attachments/Inquiries/Impeachment/Ethics Complaint prepared on 2019-01
      4. Committee Report filed on 2019-01-28
      5. Approved for Inclusion in the Calendar of Business on 2019-02-04
COMMITTEE REPORT NO. 01089
SUBMITTED ON 2019-01-28
SUBMITTED BY: INTERPARLIAMENTARY RELATIONS AND DIPLOMACY
RECOMMENDATIONS: Recommending its adoption without amendment
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON INTERPARLIAMENTARY RELATIONS AND DIPLOMACY ON 2018-11-13
DATE INCLUDED IN OB: 2019-01-29
DATE CALENDARED : 2019-01-29
